body: Hey, I've got an AMA here! Ask me anything you want! :D
body_tagged: Hey, I've got an AMA here! Ask me anything you want! :D
title: AMA - Spartemex

replies.body: it begins.
replies.body_tagged: it begins.

replies.body:
how many older nephew's do you have?


I have 5
replies.body_tagged:
how many older nephew's do you have?


I have 5

replies.body: How did you come up with your name?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come up with your name?

replies.body: What's your favourite action movie? Comedy movie?
replies.body_tagged: What's your favourite action movie? Comedy movie?

replies.body:
@MissCarmel None... 

@Tynvale One day, I was trying to come up with a Terraria name, and I combined my favorite sports team, the Spartans, with Timex, the brand watch I had at the time. You get Spartimex, and I though Spartemex looked better, and it stuck!

@Porky Action: Rush Hour 2 Comedy: Rush Hour 2
replies.body_tagged:
@MissCarmel None... 

@Tynvale One day, I was trying to come up with a Terraria name, and I combined my favorite sports team, the Spartans, with Timex, the brand watch I had at the time. You get Spartimex, and I though Spartemex looked better, and it stuck!

@Porky Action: Rush Hour 2 Comedy: Rush Hour 2

replies.body: This.
replies.body_tagged: This.

replies.body:
Why did you feel the need to make this thread?

Why did you want to become a Moderator/Jr. Mod on the server?

How bad did you want to be staff on a scale of wanting to go to hell and me wanting to go out with this one girl?
replies.body_tagged:
Why did you feel the need to make this thread?

Why did you want to become a Moderator/Jr. Mod on the server?

How bad did you want to be staff on a scale of wanting to go to hell and me wanting to go out with this one girl?

replies.body:
• I just kinda wanted to do one for a while, and I thought now is as good a time as ever.

  • I want to help out the server, and become more involved with the community

  • On a scale of 1-10, probably a 9.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Fav music genre?
replies.body_tagged: Fav music genre?

replies.body: That's a hard one. I have a soft spot for classic rock, but I really like Glitch Hop. I like Pop too, but not Rap. Probably Glitch Hop?
replies.body_tagged: That's a hard one. I have a soft spot for classic rock, but I really like Glitch Hop. I like Pop too, but not Rap. Probably Glitch Hop?

replies.body:
Nice.

I honestly like metal or Coldplay kind of music.

replies.body: How far (rank wise) do you expect to go to? (Ex: map dev, Sr mod...)
replies.body_tagged: How far (rank wise) do you expect to go to? (Ex: map dev, Sr mod...)

replies.body: I hope to become a Sr. Mod some day... And, become a member on the event committee. Although probably the farthest I'll get is a Mod.
